imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional ledger book icon with warm earth tones, suitable for application header (ledger-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Implement forms for adding and editing customers with validation for required fields (name, email, phone)
Implement a form for adding transactions with fields for customer selection, date, description, transaction type (debit/credit), and amount

Design a professional, modern UI theme with warm earth tones (terracotta, beige, olive green) and clean typography that conveys trust and financial stability, suitable for a business ledger application
Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store customer records with fields: customer ID (auto-generated), name, email, phone number, and creation timestamp

Create a backend data model to store ledger transactions with fields: transaction ID (auto-generated), customer ID (reference), transaction date, description, debit amount, credit amount, balance, and creation timestamp
Implement backend functions to create, read, update, and delete customer records
Implement backend functions to create and retrieve ledger transactions, including ability to get all transactions for a specific customer and calculate running balance
Create a customer management interface with a list view showing all customers and their current balances, with options to add, edit, and delete customers
Create a ledger transaction interface for each customer showing transaction history with columns for date, description, debit, credit, and running balance
